products.name: Full-Length Skirt
products.summary: This plaid, cotton skirt will keep you warm in the air-conditioned office or outside on cooler days.

reviews.comment: Greatest purchase I have ever made in my life.
Absolutely love them! Can't stop wearing!

products.name: Peasant Blouse
products.summary: Look your best this fall in this V-neck, pleated peasant blouse with full sleeves. Comes in white, chocolate, forest green, and more.

products.name: High-Waisted Skirt
products.summary: Available in khaki, taupe, and dove gray, this high-waisted, cotton skirt hits just below the knees.

products.name: Leather Backpack
products.summary: This cute miniature pack has adjustable straps, allowing it to be carried on your back, or as a purse. The genuine leather comes in cream, black, mahogany, and wine.

products.name: Sweetheart Dress
products.summary: Be bold in red with this fashionable, yet comfortable dress. Three-quarter-length sleeves are perfect for the in-between weather of autumn.
